backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Pashu Mandi backend, defining data types and CRUD APIs for animal listings, user profiles, and messaging, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two helpline/contact-detail update features to their target files (HelplinePage.tsx and Layout.tsx) with test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the Pashu Mandi React app including styling, routing, hooks, and page components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Pashu Mandi' and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all app routes (home, post-ad, listing detail, messages, profile, signup, helpline) and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ChatThread.tsx: Chat thread component that displays a conversation with a recipient, supports sending messages, auto-scrolls to the latest message, and shows date separators and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component with a sticky header, responsive navigation links, and authentication handling via Internet Identity login/logout.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Card component for displaying an animal listing with photo, category badge, VIP styling, and formatted price; includes category label and color mappings.
frontend/src/components/PaymentModal.tsx: Modal dialog for handling UPI payment flow for ad posting, supporting promo codes, VIP pricing, QR code display, and a two-step payment confirmation process.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Image gallery component with a main photo view, prev/next navigation arrows, thumbnail strip, and error fallback handling for broken images.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to set up their display name and bio, blocking dismissal until the profile is saved.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state management using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, listings, messages, and sign-up operations via the canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HelplinePage.tsx: A customer support page with a contact form that validates input and shows a success confirmation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main browse page displaying animal listings with a hero banner, search/filter controls by category and location, and a featured VIP listings section.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for a single animal listing showing a photo gallery, price, metadata, seller profile, and a contact seller button that navigates to messaging.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Displays a two-panel messaging UI with a conversation list sidebar and a chat thread view, requiring Internet Identity authentication. Auto-selects conversations from URL params or defaults to the first conversation in the list.
frontend/src/pages/PostAdPage.tsx: Form page for creating animal listings with title, description, price, category, location, and up to 5 photos, supporting an optional VIP upgrade via a payment modal. Requires authentication and an existing mobile number registration.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile with editable display name and bio, and lists their active listings with an option to deactivate each. Requires Internet Identity login to access.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Registration form that collects a full name and mobile number to create a new Pashu Mandi account, requiring the user to be logged in via Internet Identity first.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall state of the 'Pashu Mandi' animal marketplace app, including project version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features with their IDs and requirements.
